sections.heading: education and support services programs; reimbursement; when
sections.text: No reimbursement for special education and support services programs shall be allowed unless the program meets the standards established by the department.SourceLaws 1973, LB 403, § 13;Laws 1976, LB 761, § 9;R.S.1943, (1984), § 43-651;Laws

79-1158.Special education and support services programs; reimbursement; when.

No reimbursement for special education and support services programs shall be allowed unless the program meets the standards established by the department.

SourceLaws 1973, LB 403, § 13;Laws 1976, LB 761, § 9;R.S.1943, (1984), § 43-651;Laws 1987, LB 367, § 46;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-3346;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 840;Laws 1997, LB 865, § 11;Laws 2019, LB675, § 42.
